name: KdenLive Assets
description: Assets used in the nonlinear video editor, KdenLive.

entries.title: Video Attribution Title Card
entries.description: A title card that animated from the top of the screen. Serves as a template for attributing video footage in a video

entries.title: Audio/Music Attribution Title Card
entries.description: A title card that animated from the right side of the screen. Serves as a template for attributing video footage in a video. Add an icon to the bubble to customize the style!
